creator: LaserCo
title: Moire LASER effect with a handmade laser
materials_required: Open Can diode (from Lite On DVDRW drive)
Collimating lens (from a cheapo laser pointer)
description: This project creates a Moire LASER effect by shining a laser beam onto lighters, producing interesting patterns that can be projected onto a screen or wall.
steps: Collect dead lighters, specifically green or blue ones, as they produce noticeable patterns when illuminated by a laser.
Secure the lighter(s) in the top of a can, adjusting the height and angle to direct the display upwards onto a screen.
Stabilize the laser by placing it on top of a can with a wad of tissue paper to prevent wobbling.
Adjust the distance and angle of the laser beam to achieve the desired Moire effect. Experiment to find the optimal focal plane, noting that dimming patterns indicate low batteries.
